item.description:
Mandarin Conversation group Meetup.

2nd Monday and 4th Saturday meetings to practice Mandarin conversation. Learners of all levels, and native speakers welcome!

We are going to eat at East Ocean City (cantonese seafood restaurant--Has many other dishes that you see in other chinese restaurants too) in Chinatown this 2nd Monday and chat and have fun since the other location (BCNC) will be closed. So, bring money.


For directions:
http://maps.google.co...

East Ocean City Website:
Website: http://www.eastoceanc...


Adele

group.name: The Boston Mandarin Chinese Language Meetup Group

item.name: The Boston Chinese Language October (2nd Monday) Meetup
